content:
IT HAPPENED

https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h

GLORY IN THE THUNDER NOW AVAILABLE AS WEB SERIAL AS I HAVE BEEN THREATENING FOR YEARS

do you want to read a story about a bunch of queer teens tripping face first into way too much divine power for their own good? OF COURSE YOU DO https://t.co/S22MVVXX3n

I got really sick and while I was in bed, I read over 1000 pages of a scifi kung fu comic in Chinese. I've spent the last two days making a fan translation of the first 60 pages, and I'll keep going if people are interested. You can read it here. https://t.co/6mMEZyUA9x https://t.co/NV3IWlxHhM

🚨 breaking radio silence to deliver a critical warning: the xz upstream tarballs have been backdoored for one month. This is a five alarm fire for everyone who uses Linux. 

https://t.co/oGz9JvD5er

https://t.co/DnvWEVUSV9
Episode 82: Barsamin fires his emergency back-up conscience. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/kNzdzaAhZu

Episode 81: Houri antagonizes the mighty goddess Tsovinar in her holiest of holies: a desk she totally staked out for herself in the public library. Featuring a concept art I clearly drew in 2017 specifically. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/mB5cenAEAU

Episode 80: Happy birthday Hayr! We got you fan service and also a malevolent god who thinks it's really funny to fuck with you specifically. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/jhoqtEHKf0

Boy/girl romance is unusual but not forbidden in this story. Featuring a drawing where I had to cross out the word "buttresses" and re-upload it because an OCR algorithm flagged it as a TOS violation. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/qEk74265i8

I wrote this scene before I myself had to deal with arguing with foreign governments about my rights and I am here to say: yeah actually it's exactly like this. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/DWIt9iqnjL

I have my phone set to manual app updates so I get to play the minigame of tapping on every update icon except Twitter’s

(yes it still works, I’m posting from it right now) https://t.co/REYA6JwcpN

Episode 77: Barsamin closed the door behind him, but no sooner had it clicked shut than he realized he had made a mistake of incomprehensible magnitude: the actual excerpt the author wanted to paste didn't fit in one tweet. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/Ve5emzLeh5
Episode 75: one of my personal favorite scenes in this story: neither of these boys understands they are flirting. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/2LUiVWoXn5

y’all I am bringing you the research from mastodon

the toothbrush ddos thing was originally posed as a hypothetical example by a researcher and translation issues happened somewhere. It did not literally happen despite the sudden surge of news articles saying it did.
Episode 74: Hayr turns his back for three seconds and his little brother starts breaking rules. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/2DsbTk0mYW
Episode 73: making weird dolls of your hated enemies is an art form that has to come from the heart. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/eRwvvFUoci

Fiori is clearly autistic! We stan a flawless queen! Fiori is clearly a cop! We stan an extremely problematic queen! Read Glory in the Thunder, it has so many disaster women https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/fJmaUF4Lqr

Episode 71: it's pitched as some kind of god-on-god action story but actually Glory in the Thunder is about settling once and for all which branch of Indo-European is the coolest. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/3Q3A18D29w

Episode 70: it's bad when a wise and elderly god is clearly up to something, but a 10-year-old god clearly being up to something is much, much worse. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/h2xiLbT4Qv
Episode 69: nice! Katarosi finds out her stalker is in a transparently white-supremacy-coded cult! not nice! Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/O8YkMO1kut
Episode 68: Hayr has learned to just let the whimsical evil god nonsense work itself out. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/0P9qzOcS33

Episode 67: Ismyrn, when your brother is dating your best guyfriend, there are certain subjects one should never under any circumstances contemplate raising. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/oV6YirWACX

looking for childhood friends:

- everquest player Mixelplex, guild Sun Blade, server Fennin Ro

- Mary Caitlin McF., moved from Virginia to Latvia when she was 10, went to college in Finland

I keep wondering where they ended up in life (it's me, Melissa from Virginia)

why do so many websites go out of their way to block pasting into the password field? who is telling them this is a good idea? it’s not. you’re breaking password managers and accessibility, for literally no reason
Episode 65: Katarosi is now the protagonist of an otome game. The kind with a lot of abrupt violent endings. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/YaFdSWI4vN
There is no Glory in the Thunder update tonight because I’m on a beach near the arctic circle, the ideal location in January. Good time to catch up then 😎 https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h

my annual advice, as a person who has successfully made many improvements in life: that New Year's Resolution list you made? ONE. CHANGE. AT. A. TIME. If you try to solve all your problems on January 1st, you'll get overwhelmed and solve none of them.

Episode 64: introducing Hayr's one white friend, by which I mean his several white friends because this is girl is definitely girls plural. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnsbTP https://t.co/ADfoyQ5vfY

stuck at your aunt's house for the holidays? hiding in the bathroom because you can't handle it? read Glory in the Thunder, the fantasy story by a queer brainweird for queer brainweirds https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/h5W13gmIYG
Episode 63: ohhhhhh no, bad news everyone, Houri is 16 now. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnsbTP https://t.co/hsJoNqug27
the maker of Baba Is You has made some sort of gaiden game about Baba piloting a mech and it is, at least at the moment, free https://t.co/klGONqa3By

good morning from the EU @Patreon @PatreonSupport I was linked to a project update and after clicking “reject nonessential cookies” the unscrollable dark overlay did not go away, rendering the page useless, and low key violating the GDPR by spiting me for rejecting cookies https://t.co/h60mktB4iq

ALL NEW NEVER BEFORE SEEN BONUS SCENE: Katarosi is over here like "fuck my husband UP Luzcrezo, give him hang-ups he'll still be explaining to new therapists in twenty years." Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/bNRRLQgLnH

Episode 60: this is the final chapter of volume 1. There will be an all-new bonus scene on Saturday, and volume 2 will begin immediately afterwards at the same url. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/FhQkgiwPyt

if you are experiencing weirdly low quality youtube on an ARM device, the problem and a workaround has been identified, and hopefully google will update their heuristics after being yelled at https://t.co/WgVyHyBROa
I am going to repeat to y'all what I just told someone who was deeply wronged by a family member: "Keep in mind you can forgive someone and still enforce boundaries."

Google has announced that they will now consider an account dead and delete it if it receives no logins for two years. If you have any secondary gmail accounts, or have custody of someone else's, you should set an alarm on your calendar to manually log into it every few months.

Episode 57: when Houri read ahead in her own story to check for sex scenes, she might have missed some more important details. Read Glory in the Thunder, there's no sex scenes but it's seething with repressed queer kink https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/SGFXw8MIZ7
Episode 56: Several Gods Are Typing. Read Glory in the Thunder and push it over 1000 reads: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/GnQI6vZ9dE

Do you have a resume gap because you were Seriously Goddam Sick? I was out of work for five years due to illness and this is what I ended up telling employers: "I was providing care for a sick relative."

Reader, it was me. I was my sick relative and I was taking care of myself.

Episode 53: surely all the dads together can sort this out even though none of them have the incredible superpower of Being A Teen. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/sjAeicNAS0

Episode 52: Katarosi, how do you think this broke country with no standing army has been hanging on for the last twenty years if not your mother committing the occasional unforgivable sin? Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/ZvdoWReai4

Episode 51: Aramaz started this day riding his horse and minding his own damn business and now he's mixed up with every problem on the peninsula. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/YBWP65H4vn
Episode 50!: normal things are happening in the murder woods full of murder girls. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/8L1coRzIz2
Episode 49: meanwhile, the villains' children would like to get a word in edgewise. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/hjZGAEHfNW
Episode 48: no Barsamin, killing people is evil, let Aunty Gun do it for you. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/JZCNJseSnB

Episode 46: is this girl writing sappy fanfic really the same Dzovin-nar-Izael that Hayr knows...? Read Glory in the Thunder, did I mention it has plurality themes: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/QdXNeoTeZ4
just fyi my practice of manually mirroring every post to twitter is dying off https://t.co/UIKp1X6TlK

Episode 45: a grim situation I didn't have a chance to draw an illustration for so instead you get Ziazan Not Appearing In This Scene. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/IqfHJZh6ep
if you are a bandcamp user, you should make sure you have a local download of all your albums in high quality, because they're in a situation where they may stop existing As Such on short notice

We have a feed on yammer for posting information such as how to report phishes. Yammer, a Microsoft service, generated a summary email and sent it through Office 365, a Microsoft service, which proceeded to flag it as extremely suspicious and drop it in the scammer hole
as someone who is closely entwined with both the United States and the Netherlands, I am glad that Joran van der Sloot has finally formally confessed to murdering Natalee Holloway

every friend group got the goody two-shoes goddess’s favorite, the princess who’s trying to break her vow of chastity on purpose and failing, and the trans boy who is setting interesting precedents in divine law. 

read glory in the thunder https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/AF6RGBOVH2
every time I have to review software source code that was written by a hardware company I come away with the feeling that I have encountered an alien form of life

filling out some due diligence forms like:
are you currently a head of state?: no
have you previously been a head of state?: no
are you planning on becoming a head of state?: hmm,
dear google setting one of these options to 13px and the other to 14px is absolutely unhinged https://t.co/1Nutj2UTib

chinese character etymology joke dot png 

[the character for “swim” contains, separately, both the full and shorthand forms of the character for water] https://t.co/LTB71BSHcf

github is advertising a conference to me with “get your AI questions answered, we know you have some”

yes I do and I guarantee you don’t want to answer them on a stage
last night while trying to sleep I was instead burdened with the thought “pornographic age gates should ask you to identify generic popular youtubers and deny you entry if you get them right”
Episode 44: featuring rare Genuinely Astonished Tsovinar and maybe not-so-rare Genuinely Upset Hayr. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/STptuyIolP

it's nethack doomsday!
Due to the very rare confluence of multiple real-world-date based penalties, today, October 13, 2023 is uniquely difficult in nethack! It is recommended to use a current from-source build due to Reasons. https://t.co/jCFECqFVzz

reminder: tomorrow, October 13, 2023 will be the most difficult day to play nethack for years in either direction and ascending during this confluence of bad luck would be turboswag. https://t.co/jCFECqFVzz

Hang on, where’s my copy of Lord of the Rings?

No no, in English.

That’s… even less English.

Ah, here’s the Eng— 

… this isn’t even a joke, I can’t find my English copy of Lord of the Rings https://t.co/GRjBgA9zWH

either Dunkin’ Donuts doesn’t know how to configure windows professional or they’re running windows home on a point of sales terminal 

(honestly I assumed they were android until I saw this) https://t.co/KyFUychlTn

one of these is the leaked official, original source code of Pokemon Emerald and one of these is a decompile made by hobbyists trying to reverse engineer what the game is doing

and you know I wouldn't be posting this if they were not, apparently, switched at birth. https://t.co/2XI76Ccub6
OneNote for iOS is pretty good other than this feature I just discovered where it crashes if you go through a train tunnel while on cellular

just got an automatic refund out of nowhere from amaz*n because they claim the package, which I received in good working order, was returned to them undelivered. ??? did interdimensional shenanigans occur
scientific evidence that it really wasn’t your fault: the super mario 3 roulette minigame is rigged to be random! https://t.co/7kVvR0ht4G

me, 42 pages into a Chinese public school textbook for first graders: okay there doesn’t seem to be anything too, uh, ideological in here

page 43: we’re sending a boat to Taiwan to pick up all the children so they can come play with us at our school! :)
today on “living in a charming place” problems: came home to discover my front doorway was occupied by a bride doing a photo shoot 😂
today on geoguessr: Deception https://t.co/CFuw4zcnGm

Episode 43: the main characters will spend their lives struggling with the ethics of power while Oseni runs around with "I'm a cowgirl, bangedy-bang, and I'm shootin' all around" playing on loop https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/BfJIPAEWUM

Having to break through a parent lock in a Chinese children’s game to increase the amount I’m allowed to play it is perhaps the funniest reason for me to be learning Chinese financial numerals (super extra complicated digits to prevent editing)
“we can’t find any good candidates for this role” you’re auto-rejecting people with 20 years experience because they don’t have a degree and then AI-sorting the rest by how Jared their name is
@exceptionalnull @neilkli that’s definitely exactly what is happening, there are hidden prompts added to your prompt and signs, word bubbles etc can leak information about them

free advice to corporate website ✨engagement✨ seekers: playing a gods damn DING sound when the page loads is a lot more likely to get people to quickly close the page in horror or rage than it is to get them to ✨engage✨

this means you, @MagnetForensics

for the record, “I pressed like on a mega-viral tweet and when I checked later it wasn’t liked” is a bog standard distributed systems bug that’s been in twitter for years and doesn’t require special case by case conspiracy to explain
my first serious attempt at Chinese calligraphy (selected verses about the value of learning from Three Character Classic) with the traditional tool: a purple sparkle gel pen https://t.co/v1iN6iXJna
good morning to William of Orange who was waiting at the Leiden train station for someone in a full set of conquistador armor, enjoy the siege guys

we are married 

born to make history 🌟 https://t.co/r8LFJ5OCDM

typed something I found in a children’s book into google translate one character at a time https://t.co/xZ22I52HNV
read Glory in the Thunder, which is in part the story of an aloof goddess ceaselessly plagued by the world’s most attractive mortals https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/CstzHTgEGo
I love apps from China, it will be completely professionally put together and have in-app purchases and then you get ten minutes into using it and it slams you with the Pokemon victory theme

Felt like drawing Serriden, the pious priestess of the pure and perfect flame who did *not* realize her goddess was bisexual. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/cxWyPDUYXN

I found my unfinished hand copy of The City of Ladies (feminism text from medieval times) Dutch edition 

(inks: iroshizuku peacock green and morning glory blue, pens: pilot parallel and just a gold gelly roll for the gold) https://t.co/QTEaSXJ3Ex
I probably don’t need to keep this introductory book to artificial intelligence published in 2002. https://t.co/AEYnT9JNPo
the current state of my “Chinese writing system” special interest is a complete set of Chinese public school language arts textbooks off ali express (they’re really cheap) https://t.co/5Bie1wQV8n
hey, I found my ninjatel! it still boots fine, though it doesn’t really… do anything, without the shady van https://t.co/O7MkCdr4fU https://t.co/e1REgagzXv
big oof, found this cleaning out my stuff. This was given to me at defcon ten years ago. I’m keeping it. https://t.co/FkJMcdgsOb
RNG that seeds by pressing spacebar on twitch and checking whether it toggled pause, toggled fullscreen, scrolled the window or a secret fourth thing
the amazon guy created a side quest for me by dumping all packages for my street inside the locked, private interior of my building, but I have successfully delivered all of them
as someone currently cleaning out their junk drawer, I would like to review the Kuretake Zig Mangaka Flexible brush pen as still working after five years rattling around a junk drawer
been kind of obsessed thinking about how to localize my characters' names for a hypothetical Chinese translation (I am nowhere near fluent enough to actually do such a thing yet)
Episode 41: don't worry Barsamin, it's not blood, it's... festive ketchup! Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/KExiafpJrq

Hello to the girl who got off the plane from China with a small suitcase in one hand and an enormous wok in the other. I assume it’s a legendary +5 wok and you’re here to blow away an international cooking competition

hmm it’s still saturday somewhere

I am a bisexual woman, in exactly a week I am marrying a bisexual man, we will both still be bisexual afterwards it turns out #CelebrateBisexualityDay

you: have you read the Art of War? 🧐
me: bro I’ve read it in the original Classical Chinese *slams down a colorful cartoon edition with pinyin clearly meant for small children* https://t.co/0qEOvwRbo2
I think I could make a theme blog just out of bizarre product images I find on ali express. This is a promotional image for post-it notes https://t.co/kyLxniTnMd

I have been informed by linguists that Śaṅkhalipi, or shell script, is currently undeciphered. I know bash is obtuse but surely there’s at least one Unix old hand who can still read it? https://t.co/BOIRp8vuZL

the Dutch post office website has no conception of there not yet being a known delivery window, despite this Very Often Being The Case, and just renders them as null strings resulting in the message "expected between and"

woke up to a bluecheck tagging me in an ultra-long and probably AI-generated post that just completely makes up what my job is (I audit firmware for vulnerabilities before it goes to market!) https://t.co/7THzvNgG4v
Critical Dutch signage: meeuwen overlast = seagull difficulties https://t.co/xXAwE2zyXf

Apple’s new voice cloning TTS (entirely on-device) came out just in time to help me cope with the fear I may be suffering permanent hearing damage. I assume if/when they make improvements it will be able to re-process the same voice recording inputs 

(this is iOS 17) https://t.co/dsNxGy2cfF
me and my girl girlfriend on a date at the manor https://t.co/IWq2GhpmYT
I just told someone in all seriousness that a certain historical-facts account is not up to the rigorous fact checking standard established by nintendo fan blog Supper Mario Broth
girl who is now on indefinite medical leave due to a severe ear infection that has resisted treatment and a severe lack of appointment slots with ear specialists
I don’t know why a random vendor on aliexpress was selling pins that literally have my name on them but it’s very convenient https://t.co/Bv3NiRi5UN

there’s a trail of wilted rose petals leading from the door of a sorority apartment to a public trash can full of roses. this is obviously the clue that breaks open a sordid murder mystery but I’m kind of busy
I can't believe this is a valid sentence, but: I see the Hello Kitty game took some dungeon design inspiration from the electric mechanics in botw/totk
I treat oddities in video games like an invisible wall in a strange spot as a crime scene investigation. what depths of desperation drove the devs to resort to this?

if adding a second round of encryption makes it twice as hard to crack, that implies the second layer has a one-bit key 

like they somehow managed to severely understate a technically-true marketing claim https://t.co/fz0ko18cCq
you vs the fluorescent agent content she told you not to worry about https://t.co/dpzjpXGSMV

*slams open the thousand year door*

DID SOMEONE SAY THOUSAND YEAR DOOR
Hello to the team of people resolutely *walking* down the neck-deep canal instead of swimming. I imagine it’s an endurance exercise but y’all look like an undead invasion
if y'all were trying to help me find an Akkadian word that doesn't seem to exist, it turned out to be a translation issue with the original German source, sorry for the fake mystery.

Unity: if we announce during an Apple keynote, then the tech discourse will be 99% Apple 1% us

Actual observed reality: 99% Unity 1% Apple
Episode 39: there mmmmmmmight be something wrong with Houri. Read Glory in the Thunder: https://t.co/QTHkmnrE4h https://t.co/8JFl6AoqG3

some scammer out there has a big list of all the most popular tweets about cryptocoins and reposts them on their bluechecked front accounts. one of my tweets is on that list. it’s extremely negative about cryptocoins. 😂
enjoying how my delayed package showed up with an audit trail taped to it about how it's late because "I" contacted them and told them I would be on vacation, which Did Not Happen

My most profound twitter lore is that I once made a tweet that mentioned lathes, the famously homophobic inventor of javascript replied to it and then pinned his reply??, and for years I suffered a deluge of middle-aged white men who wished to discuss lathes with me

The new Hello Kitty Animal Crossing is perfect for language practice because there is no "tell the NPC to fuck off" button or any other way I can see to screw it up

(you can control the language of an individual iOS app separate from the OS in its settings pane)

TIL that certain plant saps (such as figs) are UV-reactive so if you get some on your hands and then walk under an ultraviolet lamp your skin gets severely burned. love to discover new and secret perils of the earth
I had a dream that China got a new head of state, a much younger man, and then he immediately went to prison for spending the national treasury on rolling waifus in Genshin Impact

Time to stick my hand in the #pluralpride beehive

I am formally diagnosed DID

I put the word “plural” in my bio, because I wanted to

I am not offended by people/systems who identify with the concept of “plural” even if they don’t have their friggin’ paperwork in order
are eBay’s lawyers aware that eBay’s engagement department added a “click to lie about item” button https://t.co/hgi8BWIikj
I would have killed a man for this ridiculous contraption when I was eight years old https://t.co/vnbEE7JsBX
to the Roman centurion wandering around downtown Leiden with his gladius: everyone knows it’s rude to wear the red cape inside city limits.

hail mary technical support: I got a hand386, I booted it, everything was fine. I set it down for a few minutes and the screen went black and the speakers started playing random screeching. now it’s dead. any known fixes?
Dutch culture in a nutshell: this cathedral is currently furnished with a bar and with a swing that arcs over about a dozen graves https://t.co/qUu3sgwFGq

I would like to impress upon gamers that researching, writing, testing and pushing a patch for an already shipped game is much more expensive than they think and that’s why their pet bug that doesn’t actually ruin the game never gets patched

TIL that the Carian alphabet is a random rearrangement of the Greek alphabet’s symbol to sound correspondences, and is attested almost exclusively in graffiti. I think… I think it might have been a big in-joke

fedex sent me a tax bill in Dutch that says I owe 12,30 euro (this is correct formatting in Dutch). the QR code took me to a website in Dutch… which crashed with a generic error when I tried to pay 12,30 until I changed it to 12.30.
Just had google translate OCR an empty bookcase as 目 and translate it as “eye”

I remember the first time, when I was about 11, that I saw someone with an avatar that was clearly custom art made to fit their username rather than an image they found on geocities. To me this was unprecedented mastery of the digital domain. I was in awe of this man
etsy hasn't had a reported uptime incident since May and it chose the specific five minutes I was trying to buy something to wear to my own wedding to drop its CDN on the floor. this is biphobia

Me: finally, I found it, the department of clothes I like and want to wear 

Narrator: it was the department sized for girls age five to eight https://t.co/8sqLVuOy8R

today I visited two cathedrals, an ancient tower, the graves of William of Orange and Vermeer and a ferris wheel but the thing that stood out the most was the Elder Scrolls user interface on the gift shop cash register https://t.co/7adn49Ugpe
@eatijr Buying all of the blue in delft, twice, for five bucks is pretty good

the much lower costs of the Dutch healthcare system are great. the fact that I have an "oh no, this is bad" referral from my doctor to the hospital and they just told me it will be between seven and twelve weeks before they can see me is... less great
I am entering my “haunting the rafters of the cathedral” era https://t.co/4a2NDokRZM

Windows, why do you need to "set up" the laptop keyboard I'm typing on to ask about this and is it seriously wired up as PS/2 on a device not even thick enough to support a PS/2 connector https://t.co/wDPN2vmBWR

There’s a sign in English in this Dutch Starbucks saying that plastic cups have been abolished “by Royal decree” which is the funniest way possible to say “look, tourists, it’s an environmental regulation”

the next episode of GITT is delayed until morning. it's a Katarosi one so stay tuned
Hello to the boat full of Barbie and Ken cosplayers sailing through the Leiden pride parade

I needed a simple low capacity USB 2.0 drive for interacting with Traditional Technology and it was cheaper to add several to the cart until I reached the free shipping threshold than to pay for the envelope
@Scripter171 in my case anything that isn't a completely ordinary in every way very small-capacity usb 2.0 flash drive is unlikely to work. DOS, like, Microsoft DOS, is involved
my discord informs me that Paw Patrol isn’t even operating under color of law but is a private paramilitary organization which is a terrible piece of lore to learn at seven in the morning
sorry but my package was x-rayed by *who?* https://t.co/etZIQ6eqx5
